players.name: Bob
memory: You: "I am very suspicious of Diana since she has been unusually quiet so far. We should focus on gathering more information before voting."
Diana: "I have important information: Charlie is the mafioso. We need to act on this now to protect the town."
You: "I find Diana's sudden accusation of Charlie suspicious, especially since she was quiet before. We need to be careful and not rush to vote without solid evidence."
Diana: "I am the detective and I have confirmed Charlie is the mafioso. Alice was killed last night, and we cannot afford to waste time doubting me. Vote Charlie to keep the town safe."
Votes: Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Bob (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Diana voted for Charlie
